name: spy poison
description:
READ BEFORE PLAYING

Because I only had 4 hours of my weekend to work on the game, I wasn't able to complete it ;-; the original version of the jam is still playable and executes your idea but it's buggy... anyways, download the "post jam" version

the concept of the game is:

* There is a spy in the party and you need to poison him.

*the spy will also try to poison you.

*you have to find out where you are and then try to find out where the enemy spy is.

*when the time is up, everyone goes to drink (water of course) at the nearest table, everyone who goes to the poisoned table dies.

* to restart the game, close and enter again (on the game jam version) or wait a little bit (on post jam version).

controls

WASD or arrows: move 

Spacebar: Poison nearby table (you can only poison one)
